file_content.text: There is no death... only the Force.
You're strong. But not strong enough!
Treachery won't save you!
Master Ramos. The Council's concerned.
All due respect, Councillor, but now is not the time!
Ah, come in. I'd introduce you around, but I think we're past small talk.
Besides, you already know Darbin Sull.
That's right. And you Green Jedi never saw it coming.
Enough! The citizens of Corellia will decide your fate. Now we must defend our Council.
I won't repeat myself. Surrender your lightsabers, and bow to the Empire.
Give up, or die.
I don't know how you slipped past security. We'll repair the flaw after you're dispatched.
Let's not be hasty, Ramos. We've had a good run. Surrender sounds good right about now.
Have faith, Councillor. Corellia's citizens look to the Green Jedi for guidance. We won't abandon them now.
Once I choke the life out of you, the rebels will obey my every command.
Your resistance is finished.
Stand back, Darbin. This is going to get messy.
I'm ready for you, Ramos.
You will fall to me here, your allies will surrender, and Corellia will serve the Empire.
Let me explain how this ends.
My blaster, your lightsaber--now. Your Green Jedi pals can help if you need 'em.
Let's do this.
I won't say it twice. Lay down your lightsabers, and bow to your new rulers.
Listen to Darbin. Give up.
You've insulted our dedication for the last time.
Don't try anything, Ramos. I've seen this bunch tear through an entire army without breaking a sweat!
Don't be crazy, Ramos. He's carved up whole armies with that lightsaber of his. He'll do the same to you!
She'll kill you, Ramos. I've seen her crush entire squads, then slice ships in two with that lightsaber--all without breaking a sweat!
He's a monster, Ramos. Whole armies run from his dark powers in terror. Facing him's suicide!
Look at her, Ramos. She's mad with power. I've seen her shoot lightning from her fingertips and fry an entire battalion!
He's too fast for your Force tricks, Ramos. I've seen him blast an entire platoon before they pulled their weapons!
Give up, Ramos. I've seen her shoot the medals off a general a mile away. No way she'll miss from a few feet!
This is suicide, Ramos! He's the galaxy's top hunter. I've seen him disintegrate entire platoons just to kill his target!
It's hopeless, Ramos. Look at those guns, that cold stare. She'll blast you a million times before you can blink!
Enough of your tricks, Councillor! Be quiet, and see how weak your friend really is.
I'm done with your lies, Councillor. Now see just how weak your friends really are.
Calm down, Councillor. No one can face the entire Green Jedi Council and live.
Well, I tried.
The Green Jedi's followers are traitors to the Empire. I'll execute them, right after you.
I'll kill your citizens next.
You'll never lay a hand on them!
Master Ramos! Remain calm. Remember your teachings.
I'll carve your precious Corellia to pieces. Unless you strike me down...
Hit me!
You've wounded this planet for the last time!
I'll torment every living thing on this planet. Only your fury can stop me!
Embrace your anger!
I'll wipe your dark presence from the galaxy!
You'll never strike. Even knowing the horrible things I'll do.
Coward!
You were dead the second your Imperial boots ground into Corellia!
I'll hunt down everyone you know on Corellia. And I'll kill them all.
Hit me!
Your vile career ends here!
The Council wants you to fail.
Ramos, you know we stand behind you! Now control yourself!
I'm sorry. I--I don't know what came over me.
All right. Party's over.
Corellia's depending on us. Let's show this scum the strength of the Green Jedi.
Enough games. [Attack]
Try your best. Our Council won't fall!
Not if I have anything to say about it.
They're all yours!
